website_summaries.verdict: The side design of this walker won't work for all users, but for those who need a model made for use with one hand, it's a durable, well made option.
pros: Features a hemi design that is suitable for individuals with use of one hand or arm
Aluminum build is rated to withstand up to 300 lbs
cons: Some customers with limited strength may find it a bit heavy
Height is a little challenging to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Hemi-Walker You'll Want To Get
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Never heard of one before but it is the ideal walker for my wife. She had a stroke and lost mobility on her left side both arm and leg. This walker allows her to use her right hand and is able to maintain her balance without any issues. Since she cannot use her left arm, this is ideal for her.
customer_reviews.author: rwscls

customer_reviews.title: Great Hemi Walker
customer_reviews.text: My son had a stroke and needed this walker. It is lightweight but sturdy. He can easily fold it and put it away when it is not being used. Also, adjusts for his 6'1" stature.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED!n
customer_reviews.text: A great product. Very well made. Move one thing to collapse for storage. It can be used on the side under your shoulder or you can place it in front of you to pass through narrow places. Both positions provide excellent stability. There is an easy learning process (better stability is achieved by holding it in one position). I notice that the hand grip is a little slippery when my hand is wet. I think this walker is much more discrete than the common two handed models.
customer_reviews.author: roweazmike

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have--it saves me a fall a day. I have two: one near each of my favorite sitting chairs. With it I do not need a lift chair. But the real kicker to this walker is that you can use it with one hand and it is THE ONLY WALKER THAT WILL NAVIGATE NARROW HALL AND TIGHT TURNS. I would rather be without a brain than without these walkers. And what a great price. They are not a walker for outdoors as they lack wheels for distance but are great for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: august caryl

customer_reviews.title: Stability for the One-armed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent option for someone who is limited in using one of their arms due to surgery or other reason and needs assistance with their stability. Provides more stability than a cane but is slightly more difficult to wield.
customer_reviews.author: tjkid

customer_reviews.title: Great stability easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way to transition from a rolling walker to a cane. A regular and a quad cane did not provide enough stability. The hemicane is great.
customer_reviews.author: Donald S. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Walker for people that only have use of one arm
customer_reviews.text: My mother-in-law recently broke her arm and was in a rehabilitation facility where they used this device. We purchase one for her so she could get around her home as she could not use her walker anymore. This was the perfect replacement for her walker she actually likes it better than using her walker. it looks heavy in the photo but in real life it's actually quite lite and folds down flat for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for transition from walker to cane
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Hemy walker today and it’s everything that I had hoped it would be. After complications from a hip replacement surgery this will make my transition from that walker to a cane a confident one. I wasn’t ready for the cane but sooooo ready to ditch the walker. This product is perfect for that confidence that I needed. I’m confident now that getting to that cane stage will be a lot smoother due to the hemy walker.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and put away
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great help for my husband. Can’t put weight on his left leg for Another four more weeks. The Hemi Walker is a great tool to help you stable yourself. Very easy to put away and that’s a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: My old walker collapsed when I was walking one day and I fell. I had to throw it away. I got this one and didn't expect much because it didn't look as sturdy. I was pleasantly surprised when I got it. It has stayed stable several times when I lost my balance and I am not worried about falling again.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my situation. I would recommend this item to anyone needing a walker with limited hand usage or to upgrade from a normal cane for a bit more stability. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Donny Prater

customer_reviews.title: Small, sturdy, but not for use as a side walker
customer_reviews.text: This is a small "side walker". I'm using it post-op ankle surgery next to my bed for stability as I'm getting out of bed, getting to my knee scooter. Works really well for this. I would never use this as a side walker, though, unless you're pretty much able to walk normally. Then walking crutches would be more stable, I think. Recommend for limited uses.
customer_reviews.author: ElleMphs

customer_reviews.title: Slightly shorter then our current one but works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad to leave in the car because when we would go to the senior center for him to walk we would forget to bring the one at home along. It is slightly shorter then the one Medicare paid for but does the same thing. Works great helps my dad when walking and now when we go to the center we can walk him, no more forgetting the walker at home.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgett Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: We only use this one for my dad since he had a stroke. It is lightweight folds up small and goes everywhere with us! If you need a hemi-walker this is the one for you!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: This is a great aid for my wife to relearn how to walk.
customer_reviews.text: After a recent stroke may wife is relearning to use her left leg and arm. The Hemi walker allows her to work with the folks from Physical Therapy to walk with the use of her unaffected arm. Without it she would be unable to leave a wheelchair. The hope is with time she will walk unassisted. For now this equipment is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother as a replacement. It is a stronger metal and has a nice tight lock when it's opened. My mom loves it. She always knocks her other one over and this one has taken the beating so far. Medical supply stores want to charge Medicare patients way too much for these type of necessary supplies. I save tons shopping from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good for my father in law therapy
customer_reviews.text: My father in law needed this and it has been a great help for him to be able to walk and continue his therapy after a stroke that left him with little mobility from his right arm/leg. He is able to get sturdy support to take little steps at a time. This can be adjusted for different heights and it is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.text: This walker is wonderful .It put me back on my feet after a bad fall.It makes you feel secure. Highly recommended. I credit it to a successful rehab.
customer_reviews.author: Taffy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hemi cane
customer_reviews.text: I had a stroke and needed help walking, this hemi cane is very sturdy and is easy to use. The price is a lot lower than other places. I highly red this hemi cane!
customer_reviews.author: Sandlot

customer_reviews.title: Stable for Walking
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom at the request of her physical therapist. She’s graduated from a rollator to a hemi-walker since being in physical therapy for over a year. This walker is easy to use out of the box and provides a lot of stability for the user. It has a smooth opening and closing mechanism folds nicely. It’s fits up in the front seat with her and let’s her get out of the car unassisted.
customer_reviews.author: anthony frisolone

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffered a heart attack and we are trying to get him back on his feet. This hemi has been a blessing, we have had it for two weeks and you can already see improvement in his secured walking.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Stroke Patients
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for someone recovering from a stroke. Provides balance point to steady the patient from the side. For patient w contracted hand,this is considerably easier to use than a standard walker.
customer_reviews.author: Mary I Fleshman

customer_reviews.title: Dusk handles really helped me stand from varying heights
customer_reviews.text: Was lightweight and very easy to fold. I liked it better than the quad cane because of the dual level handles and the wider sturdier base. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: kparrott

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and a great price
customer_reviews.text: this walker is perfect for people with use of only one arm. It is much sturdier than a quad cane and less than half the size of a walker. Folds up nice and flat. Light weight for such a sturdy little beast.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: My father loves this, he uses it to help lower himself on the ground outside to do yard work.
customer_reviews.author: PeanutFL

customer_reviews.title: Great for stroke patients or those just needing more balance
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mom, per the recommendations of her therapist, after she had her stroke. She was using the HurryCane, but she loves using this Hemi walker. She says she feels so much more safe while walking and that she has better balance.
customer_reviews.author: Torianne Littlejohn

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for the most lightweight Hemi Walker I could find, and this was it. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Matt A

customer_reviews.title: Better than a cane
customer_reviews.text: My husband has had three strokes with left-sided weakness. He found this to be very helpful. Much sturdier than a cane.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Zomparelli

customer_reviews.title: Hemi-Walker...combination of walker and cane
customer_reviews.text: I have a history of 10+ back surgeries. I am unable to stand straight-up for less than a few feet without the aid of a walker or cane. Happened to stumble across the Hemi-walker while looking at quad canes. It is the "best" of both worlds. I takes a bit of getting used too. It takes a little longer to walk from a cane but the more I use it the better it gets. Not as bulky as a regular walker and folds easily to place in your car as needed. Pricing ranged from $25 to $100+ for the same exact product so go with the best deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but stable
customer_reviews.text: Great for those really short trips out the door....like to check the mail or sit on the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Snickers56

customer_reviews.title: Perfect One Arm Walker
customer_reviews.text: It met my husbands need for a one armed walker perfectly, was delivered within 2 days as promised, in use within minutes of receipt, no assembly required, much quicker and cheaper than several local medical supply houses indicated they could do.
customer_reviews.author: judy u

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Husband has been using for several months- he’s a big guy with a stroke and this works great for his balance and walking. Definitely recommend to anyone with a limited side disability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: wonderful walker, my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: wonderful walker, my wife loves it, it really helps her with her broke arm to be able to get around where she does not have use of both arms and hands
customer_reviews.author: DONNIE HOLLAND

customer_reviews.title: Great device for Stroke victim
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful aide to my wife following her stroke and during her rehab. It provided the stability that canes just don't give.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Safe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was very worried because of the few negative reviews however my dad (71yr, no mobility of right arm little mobility of right leg due to a stroke) has been completely safe and comfortable with his new hemi walker. It is sturdy, lightweight, and seems to not scratch as easily as his previous one. When adjusting the height of your hemi walker make sure it locks in place!! Tug on it a few times to make sure it does not move out of place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and does what it should. No wobbling. I trust it to support my weight. (180lbs)
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Williams

customer_reviews.title: The safety of your love ones
customer_reviews.text: The Hemi walker was a good investment at the beginning, until my mother lost her balance and fell and the walker fell to the floor and is bent and she can no longer use it. The material is not strong enough. The company is only refunding me a portion of my money. I don't think that is fair because the product was next durable.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Effective, good price
customer_reviews.text: Came in two days, which was great. Good price. Not quite as fancy as the one in the hospital, but just as functional for a much better price and delivered quickly to the house.
customer_reviews.author: Alembic

customer_reviews.title: Alternative to a walker?
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my mom used at rehab facility when she broke pelvis and dislocated her elbow. Helps her get around great...she wont use a full walker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but light weight.
customer_reviews.text: my father had shoulder surgery leaving him with the use of only one arm. This Hemi-walker worked very well for him. Sturdy enough to assist him when getting up from a seated position but light weight enough to use it as a cane when walking. Would recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: DCGP

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work
customer_reviews.text: The user has a stroke, it seems to work very well, said it was more stable than one in the nursing home.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Is holding up well after everyday use by my mother who is recovering from a stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Allen, K

customer_reviews.title: Great walker
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this hemi walker but wishes that it was a bit more sturdy like the ones in the nursing home. But she is walking great in her recovery using this walker.
customer_reviews.author: AJCH

customer_reviews.title: Hemi walker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect devise for my brother who had a stroke last year. Quality and price is good
customer_reviews.author: Jill M. Varrichio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love love love this as i am so much sturdier and well balanced than with my quad cane..
customer_reviews.author: belmaree skoc

customer_reviews.title: I order this for a client and the chemical smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I order this for a client and the chemical smell in the handles made her have headaches and feel light headed. I switched it out for another Hemi walker that I ordered still in box same smell. This is very concerning and have nearly ruined a relationship with the family as they felt I should have known or a least smelt the odor.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my husband needed. Easy to adjust, very sturdy and lite weight. The walker would have cost twice through a medical supply store. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: candi

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mom. She has bad arthritis. It really helps her get around. Very stable.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Bandy-Troutman

customer_reviews.title: One-hand walker.
customer_reviews.text: I had both a right arm and right leg surgery and this is the only one handed walker I could use. It works great and is sturdy,
customer_reviews.author: Richard Camera

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is getting around with this product much better.😃😃😃
customer_reviews.author: Emma Jackson

customer_reviews.title: very stable
customer_reviews.text: wife broker shoulder. this one arm walker is much much better than a cane. she is confident when using to help her walk.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Hemi walker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brace. All of her therapist Like this unit
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Scott

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WEIGH 1.1LBS AS DESCRIBED.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this SPECIFICALLY because the product description says 1.1lbs. My mother is very small and recovering from pneumonia and is still very weak. The product is actually 4lbs - which is obviously heavier. So it makes me question this product entirely as well as the company that allows a very misleading product description to be posted.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Wilson

customer_reviews.title: thrilled with this walker!
customer_reviews.text: the nursing home started using this for my husband who right arm is paralyzed and has limited use of his right leg ( which is improving) brought him home and purchased one of these to continue to use in his recovery, the therapists is very happy with this item and my husband can use it easily.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes T.

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: this product is amazing. i have ms and my right side is extremely weak. i walk with a cane in the house and a walker outside. i am very unsteady and always afraid of falling. i would not even think of going outside with a cane. this little walker keeps me steady. i am walking all over and my gait even seems better. i am so happy and to top it all off it is inexpensive! i would recommend this product highly. my walker always made me feel clumsy and seemed heavy. this product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S. Donaghue

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a hemi walker and very well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy walker for someone with the use of only 1 hand.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: I hope this walker will keep me out of a wheelchair for some time.
customer_reviews.text: Product is what my PT person said I needed since I would be unable to use one arm after surgery. Hopefully I can use it during my recovery period.
customer_reviews.author: ROD

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: My dad's 5 ft 6 in and about 165 lbs. Works well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy and very helpful
customer_reviews.text: perfect and easy to use after my stroke. I loved the adjustable legs. I'm under 5' and it works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Restfornow

customer_reviews.title: Husband is walking thanks to this!
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had best price. Good quality, stable walking instrument. Husband is happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Cardmaker in CA

customer_reviews.title: Helps get out of Chair
customer_reviews.text: This really helps my 88 year old Mom get out of her chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Fialko

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother in law she loves it
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: One handed stable walker
customer_reviews.text: I broke my shoulder and I cannot use a walker that requires you to use two hands. This hemi Walker can be used with one hand. It is much more stable than a cane.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great support device!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my grandfather after his stroke to use at home, his whole left side is paralyzed and this allows him the ability to get around easier and gives him more support then a cane
customer_reviews.author: mollyam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little more stable but then would give up the lightness
customer_reviews.author: Brad Coover

customer_reviews.title: Just like the one used at rehab
customer_reviews.text: This was used for a stroke victim learning to walk again; it is a great transistion from regular walker prior to moving on to a cane.
customer_reviews.author: MomMom Shark

customer_reviews.title: COULD BE TALLER.
customer_reviews.text: wish it was 2-4 inches taller when fully extended to better accomodate my height. (6'3)
customer_reviews.author: Buckets

customer_reviews.title: This got in the way and tripped my mom.
customer_reviews.text: This hemi walker which was recommended by therapist for my mom when she broke her shoulder and only had use of one arm, was a disappointment. It kept getting in her way and tripped her and she fell. She needed more support than a cane but only could use the one arm.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Meadows

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, light weight
customer_reviews.text: Well built, sturdy, light weight, folds easily, small enough to fit into tight spaces. I’m pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Strong, stable, sturdy & reliable, but not easily adaptable to variable situations.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device primarily for use on the many stairs I would have to negotiate at home, but found it was not useful for that purpose. The steps outside the house are of differing heights, & those in the house were too high altogether.
customer_reviews.author: Zev W.D. Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, with a broken left elbow and right leg!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Item
customer_reviews.text: This has been wonderful. After breaking my arm I couldn't get around with only one arm while recuperating. With this I can - it's very stable and useful. Price was great too. Can't recommend highly enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy D

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: The exact same model as the one you will pay 3-4x for through physical therapy.
customer_reviews.author: Darksky

customer_reviews.title: This walker is lightweight and sturdy. My husband (who is a large man) must ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. This walker is lightweight and sturdy. My husband (who is a large man) must use this many times a day to get in and out of chair(s) and bed and has no problems. It was a GREAT purchase and couldn't be more pleased. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Hemi walker for stroke therapy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband who is in rehab for a stroke. Good quality. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: cismarie

customer_reviews.title: Could not have been better
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered! My Husband is recovering from a stroke & he is delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: This hemi walker is very sturdy and well made. It will work just as we need it to.
customer_reviews.author: JackS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and fold
customer_reviews.text: Far less expensive than medical supply store. Easy to open and fold. Light weight. Glad that the physical therapist pointed it out to us.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Just in love with this. Had shoulder replacement and couldn’t use my normal walker. This takes away the weight on my better shoulder. Very light weight
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: purchase for my mother for her rehab and it works. Best buy
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My friend loves this, she has RA and loves to do yard work. She had to stop because she couldn't pull herself up. With this device she's good to go
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Stable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: My mother who had a stroke used it to help her with rehabilitation in walking
customer_reviews.author: Telita M Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed extra bars in the bathroom to transfer to the toilet. This is sturdy and well built, even though it was the least expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Side Style Hemi One Arm walker Chrome Adult
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but my house is rather small. It takes up 50% more room than a standard walker so was little use to me, but i took it with me to PT and used it there. I also left it there for someone else to use. Since then I have graduated to a large base quad cane. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: Georges

customer_reviews.title: Right tool for the right job
customer_reviews.text: not too big and bulky. easy to deploy and store. sturdy for its use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great walker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this walker for my Mom. She had a stroke and is very weak on her left side. This walker gives her the stability that she needs. It is very light weight and the design allow for a bag to be hung from it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Walker does the job.
customer_reviews.text: This hemi walker seems to be well made and is working well for my husband who is over 6 ft. tall.
customer_reviews.author: GreedyReader

customer_reviews.title: Solved the problem of safely getting from drivers seat to trunk of car to unload wheeled walker
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to open/close, light as a feather; much better than a four legged cane. Also great price.
customer_reviews.author: MaryEllen

customer_reviews.title: Well Built and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my brother who had a stroke. Great product for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Page

customer_reviews.title: Helpful following surgery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister following shoulder replacement surgery. She used one while she was in the hospital and found it very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for use when user has limited or no use of one hand. More secure that four prong cane. Light weight but sturdy. Folds up and can slip right behind seats in car.
customer_reviews.author: Jon D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stability.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly like the one used in the hospital. Very sturdy and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Mumzi23

customer_reviews.title: great for stroke victim
customer_reviews.text: more stable than a cane, less bulky than a walker
customer_reviews.author: B. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Just as described!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this walker for my father who suffered a stroke. It is the perfect walker for someone with one sided weakness. It feels sturdy and stable which ensures confidence in walking safely.
customer_reviews.author: Jen7427

customer_reviews.title: Great stability
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this walker everywhere he goes. My husband is 275 pounds and he feels very confident with this walker.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Very sturdy and much better than my straight cane.folds easily with one hand And super light, easy to put in car
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great walker
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my mother. Arrived quickly and undamaged. Works great. Very lightweight and easy to told and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. Have broken shoulder so standard walker didn't work. This is lightweight and so easy to use. Much better than a crutch. Love it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good cane for my mother who can rely on. A little pricey but it is still cheaper than medical store. i tried to but it from the store but it will go thru insurance as a deductible, so why not buy online. it is still cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: CarNut

customer_reviews.title: This work great for my Dad
customer_reviews.text: This work great for my Dad, who had broken a hip. He used it in therapy and it was more stable that his 4 prong walker.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: Drive Medical Side Style Hemi One Arm Walker, Chrome, Adult
product_meta.description: The Side Style Hemi Walker by Drive Medical is designed for individuals with the use of only one hand or arm. It is also ideal for individuals who do not require a walker but need a wider base for support. This product is lighter than a walker and more stable than a cane ensuring user safety.
feature_bullets: Designed for individuals with the use of only one hand or arm
Lighter than a walker and more stable than a cane
Ideal for users who do not require a walker but need a wider base for support
Overall Dimensions: 16"(L) x 18.5"(W) x 28.5"(H); Handle Height: 28.5"-35.5"; Weight Capacity: 300 lbs

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
